name: io.github.OneNicolas/mcp-service-public
title: Service Public France
description: MCP server for French public services data. 15 tools: administrative guides (service-public.fr), local tax rates, property transactions (DVF), tax doctrine (BOFiP), ABC zoning (Pinel/PTZ), collective bargaining agreements (KALI), company lookup (SIRET/SIREN), and simulators (property tax, notary fees, income tax). Powered by Cloudflare Workers with real-time French government API access.
